title: november 13: fake news? more like fake snow
description:
Today on the pod, Maia goes back to the beginning of snow: fake snow, that is. She talks us through the experiments that led to the ability to develop snow without freezing cold weather. Then, Maia revisits the breakout hit of a beloved star. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
